Ta gra powinna wygraƒá bo ma fajny klimat jest wciƒÖgajƒÖca fajna historia i zniszczone aperture wygrywa

Portal 2 is perhaps one of the best games ever relesed by Valve. Since 2007, Portal took a different direction. Combining parts of FPS and puzzle into a sci-fi themed adventure. Portal 2 improves on that a lot.

Amazing puzzle games can be quite hard to come by nowadays, in my opinion, but Portal 2 is a different exception. While I have played the original game released in the orange box on the Xbox 360, portal 2 is a massive step up. Not just in the quality of the game, but as a whole

I wanna talk a small bit on the graphical quality. It looks amazing and very nice to look at while beong repeatedly shot by sentrys. Additionaly, portal adds a cartoony like feeling every now and then making the game very appealing. Howver, because it looks quite nice at high (I have an FX-6300 @4.0ghz and GTX 1050ti at the time of this review) some lower end machines may struggle to work at higher quality.

Online play is perfect. WHile solving puzzles on your own is fun, doing it with a friend makes it even more enjoyable as you pass every level with your friend. While there is the option of paying with someone different, playing with friends is much better in my honest opinion. 

Overal, I 100% recommend you pick it up especialy on deals as you can get it for a very cheap price. You'll never regret it.
